data.title: pothole vision: smart route rehabilitation solution
data.description: engineered a robust solution for real time pothole detection, depth estimation using SOTA algorithms and marking the real time gps locations in map for easy accessibility of general public also has a 3d modelling system helping the engineers better visualize and understand the cause of the potholes.
data.fullDescription: engineered a robust solution for real time pothole detection, depth estimation using SOTA algorithms and marking the real time gps locations in map for easy accessibility of general public also has a 3d modelling system helping the engineers better visualize and understand the cause of the potholes.

data.title: Smart Door Guard
data.description: AI-powered security system for intelligent door monitoring and access control.
data.fullDescription: A comprehensive AI-powered security solution that combines facial recognition, real-time monitoring, and intelligent access control to provide advanced door security for homes and businesses.
